description: This file serves as the client entry point for a Remix application, responsible for hydrating the app on the client side by rendering the RemixBrowser component within React's StrictMode using React 18's hydrateRoot.

methods.name: startTransition
methods.description: React's API to schedule a transition that can be deferred for better user experience.

methods.name: hydrateRoot
methods.description: ReactDOM function to hydrate the server-rendered React app on the client.
